We're glad to announce that we have added another offshore openvz location, Ukraine as well as we now have IPV6 in Dallas.

**All Plans Include**

`• INSTANT SETUP!
• 24/7 Support
• No long term contracts
• SolusVM VPS Management Portal
• Unlimited Reboots/Reinstalls
• Fully Managed
• Root Access
• Raid Based Storage`
